generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with visible markings, typical of a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved area adjacent to the road, bordered by curbs and trees, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: A large structure with windows and architectural features is visible in the background.
- wall: A low, stone wall is visible behind the seated people on the right side.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the right side of the sidewalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including one with a traffic sign and others near the sidewalk.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign (likely a "no entry" or "do not enter" sign) is mounted on a pole.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green leaves are visible throughout the scene.
- terrain: A small patch of grass is visible near the right side of the sidewalk.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible through the tree canopy.
- person: Multiple individuals are visible walking or sitting in the scene.
- car: The hood and emblem of a car are visible in the foreground, indicating the perspective from inside a vehicle.
